${ModID}:ReapingSlash.NAME: Reaping Slash
${ModID}:ReapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BladeSpin.NAME: Blade Spin
${ModID}:BladeSpin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ShowersOfBlood.NAME: Showers Of Blood
${ModID}:ShowersOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP X times. NL Deal !D! to ALL enemies X times.

${ModID}:BloodReaper.NAME: Blood Reaper
${ModID}:BloodReaper.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. NL Apply !M! Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Bloodrage.NAME: Bloodrage
${ModID}:Bloodrage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, draw a card.

${ModID}:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
${ModID}:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Unspent [E] is conserved this turn. Exhaust.
${ModID}:Meditation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Unspent [E] is conserved this turn.

${ModID}:DemonArmor.NAME: Demon Armor
${ModID}:DemonArmor.DESCRIPTION: When you end your turn with unused [E] , gain !M! Block for each unspent [E] .

${ModID}:PrepareTheKill.NAME: Prepare The Kill
${ModID}:PrepareTheKill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Distract.NAME: Distract
${ModID}:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

${ModID}:AssassinsTraining.NAME: Assassin's Training
${ModID}:AssassinsTraining.DESCRIPTION: If you have unspent [E] at the end of your turn, Next turn, gain Strength equal to your remaining [E] .

${ModID}:SiphoningStrikes.NAME: Siphoning Strikes
${ModID}:SiphoningStrikes.DESCRIPTION: When you apply ${ModID}:Reap to an enemy gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Gank.NAME: Gank
${ModID}:Gank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played 5 or more cards this turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
${ModID}:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Choose a card in your draw pile and give it Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.NAME: Umbral Trespass
${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage. Exhaust.
${ModID}:UmbralTrespass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Next turn, deal !D! damage. Exhaustive 2.

${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.NAME: Strategic Maneuver
${ModID}:StrategicManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Select 5 cards from your draw pile and place them at the top of the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.NAME: Gold Advantage
${ModID}:GoldAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs less than it's original price, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MoltenBlood.NAME: Molten Blood
${ModID}:MoltenBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 HP. Deal !D! damage. Target loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:ReapersToll.NAME: Reaper's Toll
${ModID}:ReapersToll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double the current ${ModID}:Reap . NL Remove ${ModID}:Reap .

${ModID}:StackTheDeck.NAME: Stack The Deck
${ModID}:StackTheDeck.DESCRIPTION: Select 2 cards from the Exhaust pile and place them on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FlurryOfBlades.NAME: Flurry Of Blades
${ModID}:FlurryOfBlades.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to a random monster X times.

${ModID}:PerfectForm.NAME: Perfect Form
${ModID}:PerfectForm.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain 1 Dexterity for every 3 attack cards played. Gain 1 Strength for every 4 skill cards played.

${ModID}:ShadowWaltz.NAME: Shadow Waltz
${ModID}:ShadowWaltz.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you have played 3 or more cards this turn, draw !M! more cards.

${ModID}:SoulHarvest.NAME: Soul Harvest
${ModID}:SoulHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to all enemies. NL Gain Block equal to half of the ${ModID}:Reap on all enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AllOrNothing.NAME: All Or Nothing
${ModID}:AllOrNothing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose 3 HP per turn.

${ModID}:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
${ModID}:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Next turn, draw 2 cards and gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:ComboMastery.NAME: Combo Mastery
${ModID}:ComboMastery.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by 1 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HeavyHitter.NAME: Heavy Hitter
${ModID}:HeavyHitter.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] .
${ModID}:HeavyHitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card that costs 2 or more each turn gain [E] [E] .

${ModID}:UmbralEnergy.NAME: Umbral Energy
${ModID}:UmbralEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] . Exhaust.

${ModID}:BladesReach.NAME: Blade's Reach
${ModID}:BladesReach.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the two frontmost enemies.

${ModID}:BladesReachAssassin.NAME: Blade's Reach
${ModID}:BladesReachAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BladesReachRhaast.NAME: Blade's Reach
${ModID}:BladesReachRhaast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the two frontmost enemies. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:FinishingTouches.NAME: Finishing Touches
${ModID}:FinishingTouches.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain [E]  for each attack you've played this turn up to a maximum of !M!  [E] .

${ModID}:TendToWounds.NAME: Tend To Wounds
${ModID}:TendToWounds.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 1 Weak. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Outburst.NAME: Outburst
${ModID}:Outburst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Shuffle a Void your discard pile.

${ModID}:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
${ModID}:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if you played a card costing more than 1 this turn.

${ModID}:SlaughterTheWeak.NAME: Slaughter The Weak
${ModID}:SlaughterTheWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If the enemy has less than 50% HP, deal double damage to that enemy.

${ModID}:BloodGambit.NAME: Blood Gambit
${ModID}:BloodGambit.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Trigger ${ModID}:Reap on target enemy.

${ModID}:EdgeOfDeath.NAME: Edge Of Death
${ModID}:EdgeOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap . NL Deal damage equal to half the target's ${ModID}:Reap .

${ModID}:ShadowClone.NAME: Shadow Clone
${ModID}:ShadowClone.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand, Add a copy that costs 0 into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${ModID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this dealt at least !M! damage, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ShadowSight.NAME: Shadow Sight
${ModID}:ShadowSight.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] . NL You can only play two of this card per turn.
${ModID}:ShadowSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL You can only play two of this card per turn.

${ModID}:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
${ModID}:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a card costing 2 or more this turn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:CalculatedSteps.NAME: Calculated Steps
${ModID}:CalculatedSteps.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

${ModID}:CalculatedStrikes.NAME: Calculated Strikes
${ModID}:CalculatedStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When Retained, lower its cost by 1.

${ModID}:Brutalize.NAME: Brutalize
${ModID}:Brutalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target does not have Vulnerable, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.NAME: Shadow Ambush
${ModID}:ShadowAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has a debuff, deal an additional !M! damage.

${ModID}:DarkinRage.NAME: Darkin Rage
${ModID}:DarkinRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:WhispersOfBlood.NAME: Whispers Of Blood
${ModID}:WhispersOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Reap to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
${ModID}:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.
